sourcesContent:
<template>
  <router-link :to="link" class="app-button">
    {{ text }}
  </router-link>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    link: {
      type: String,
      required: true,
      default: '/'
    },
    text: {
      type: String,
      required: true,
      default: 'Перейти'
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.app-button {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
}
</style>
